mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, writer AS commentWriter, content AS commentContent, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS commentCreatedDate FROM comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
SELECT comment_id AS commentId, writer AS commentWriter, content AS commentContent, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS commentCreatedDate FROM comment WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(writer, content, created_date, post_id) VALUE(#{commentWriter},#{commentContent},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,#{postId})
